Class Player

java.lang.Object
Model.Player
public class Player extends Object
Represents a player in the game.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Player(String p_playerName)
    Constructor to initialize a new player.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Set<Continent>
    getD_currentContinents()
    Gets the set of continents the player currently controls.
    List<Country>
    getD_currentCountries()
    Gets the list of countries the player currently controls.
    List<Orders>
    getD_orders()
    Gets the list of orders the player has issued.

    getD_playerName()
    Gets the name of the player.
    Integer
    getD_unallocatedArmies()
    Gets the number of unallocated armies for the player.

    issueOrder()
    Issues an order for the player to deploy armies.
    Orders
    nextOrder()
    Retrieves the next order the player has issued.

    Assigns a continent to the player.

    Sets the list of countries the player currently controls.

    void

    Sets the name of the player.
    void
    setD_unallocatedArmies(Integer p_unallocatedArmies)
    Sets the number of unallocated armies for the player.
    String
    toString()
    Returns a string representation of the player, including their name, number of unallocated armies, the number of countries and continents they control, and the number of orders they have issued.

      Throws:

    • nextOrder

      public Orders nextOrder()
      Retrieves the next order the player has issued.
      Returns:
      The next order, or null if no orders exist.
